organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This guide sets forth recommendations believed essential for the application of overcurrent protective devices that limit the exposure time of dry-type transformers to short-circuit currents. This guide is not intended to imply overload capability.
